subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND
body:
Dear: John Doe

Good day sir, I received your email response and your full detailed
information today at my desk. Now all you are required to do here, is to
kindly contact our Finance company today with their contact details below,
for the immediate commencement and processing of your funds payment to you
asap. Below is the bank-information, to enable you to contact them
immediately for the processing of your long overdue funds payment to you
asap.

Bank Name:----- Region Bank, USA.
Address:  ----- 1180 Peachtree St. NW Suite 160 Atlanta Ga 30089, USA
Telephone: -----(605) 865-7358
Email:    ----- regionbank0@usa.com
Acct Officer:-- Davis Miller

Once you contact the paying bank, endeavor to keep me posted as i wait for
your update.
Best regards,
Dr. James Smith,
Dir, Foreign Operations Dept,
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND
